page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In our class of 24 pupils there were only 7 pupils whose parents worked in the High Ongar Village area.14 parents worked in a 10 mile radius,only 1 commuted to London and 2 fathers had jobs that took them abroad.13 parents have work which means they travel.Of the 24 families in the class,18 fathers and 12 mothers work outside the home.The type of employment was varied with mothers working mainly in catering,domestic and office work. Fathers were either self employed,drivers or salesmen.Only 1 father worked on a farm (parttime).
